answers.answer: I'M currently 26 wks and I've gained 11 lbs so far my doctor told me at my last visit that anywhere between 25-35 lbs is normal weight gain for the entire pregnancy but Hey every woman is different.

24 weeks, haven't gained one pound. I've actually lost a few pounds. I was 142 when I got pregnant.  I'd look into some safe dieting,  too much weight could cause gestational diabetes.  Have you been checked for that yet? My last two pregnancies I gained a lot of weight. I was very worried about this one, but doc says it's because I'm eating healthier.

Lol oh wow.. don't diet and don't worry! Just eat normal portions and only 300 calories extra per day. DON'T eat for two adults! I have gained 17 pounds so far at 25w4d. With my first child I gained 46. Oops! I totally pigged out on everything! This time I'm not even interested in eating but I make myself eat a little 4x a day. Just do your best abs be conscious of what you're eating and when you feel full stop. Eat a lot of veggies and fruits. Good luck!

I know exactly how you feel, gained 32 pounds by 28weeks, everyone puts on different amounts of weight during pregnancy! If you are feeling good in yourself you should be fine, don't try to loose weight just be conscious of the types of food you are eating, good luck!

I was 133 pounds when I got pregnant so I am feeling huge at this stage! 2nd pregnancy I wasn't near this size on my first so panicking a bit but I'm gonna try eat less treats iv just been craving cheese and choc!!My first was a girl at 9pounds 6oz so hoping it's cause it's another big baby lol
I was 134 prepregnancy weight, I am now 28 weeks and 166 pounds lol my doctor said he's not worried! And I honestly don't feel like I look that big lol
I was 154 lbs now I'm 171. Creeping slowly towards 200. I'm having a boy and he's so picky about eating. My first is a girl. I started at 118 lbs and ended at 164.

I feel like I've gained just as much, but won't know for sure until tomorrow.  28 weeks Thursday. The doc says my baby girl is just average in size. I think it's mostly me that's gaining the weight. Every test for diabetes comes back normal, but I should still try to lay off the sweets. I don't eat for two. I just eat when I'm hungry. The main problem is whenever I pass by the snack machine or am offered something that looks tasty... it's hard to say no.
I have gained 19 pounds. I am only 25 weeks. I okay with gaining 2 to 3 pounds more a month

I am 29 weeks and have gained 32_lbs my doctor is not worried. I don't eat any more then I did before pregnancy. My tests all have been perfect. I feel huge but the doctor says it will be an average size baby
I've gained 30 lbs and I'm 27 weeks. Which is above normal but my doctor doesn't seemed worried about it.
Iagree w. ^ Ayoso86 , im excepting baby #3 & ive gain 10lbs & im 29wks. Babygrl is 3lbs ... Every women gains differently.

question: Hi all! I'm 28 weeks pregnant and have put on 31 pounds my doctor said that's the amount if weight I should have put on during the whole pregnancy! Just wondering is anybody else had this kind if weight gain or what is the average gain? Thanks
title: Average weight gain for 28wks??
